Articles.Content:
So, yeah, anyone got that free 'Lego Digital Designer' software off Lego\'s 'Design by Me' website?

http://ldd.lego.com/download/

I was wondering if anyone had designed any Lego KSP packs at all.

Lame Attempt #1 (unfinished)

http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2466/ksplegoset.jpg

I\'m not that good at it.... still, a fun thing to mess around with, maybe we could get a Cuusoo project going?

Ooh, nice idea!

Thing is, we need 10K supporters to get the project to be looked at, and last I checked, there were about 26K people registered on the forums [probably 32K by now] and only a small, small fraction of those post semi-frequently.

TLG would also have to buy the rights from Squad to produce these sets. Seeing as KSP isn\'t even finished yet, it might not be a good idea. Keep in mind Minecraft LEGO was only put onto Cuusoo after the 'final' release.

I used to have one of the lego space shuttles when I was younger..

Almost wish I was still young so I could make one from scratch

I have this software, and some boxes full of legos... i of course tried to do the Mk1 pod, but it didn't work well due to lack of white pieces/green minifigs...

I\'ll maybe join the project, but I still have an old model to finish beforehand.

Also,I found a amazing model of the Mk1 pod wich I used to build the first attempt, search 'sci-fy meshes Kerbal space program Mk1 pod model'

Edited May 13, 2015 by Emilio

NO FRIGGIN WAY.

I have that set as well! It\'s scattered throughout my bins, but I still have it!

I had another set from that line (Delta II, Odyssey, and Mars Rover). I loved it, but then I lost it.

Lowest eBay price: $234

FUUU

So, yeah, anyone got that free 'Lego Digital Designer' software off Lego\'s 'Design by Me' website?

http://ldd.lego.com/download/

I was wondering if anyone had designed any Lego KSP packs at all.

Lame Attempt #1 (unfinished)

http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2466/ksplegoset.jpg

I\'m not that good at it.... still, a fun thing to mess around with, maybe we could get a Cuusoo project going?

That quite a good rocket for you\'re first attempt!
Hahah, i live right where this is made. I have a Venator Cruiser myself.
